citeinfo.title: Travel Behavior Inventory (TBI) 2010 Household Interview Survey

descript.abstract:
Household travel survey conducted from fall 2010 to spring 2012 as part of the 2010 Travel Behavior Inventory (TBI).
The TBI is a battery of surveys conducted 2010-2012 to support transportation planning and transportation forecast model development.
Dataset includes record surveyed in 2010, as well as some records from 2005 for routes that were not surveyed in 2010. Four expansion factors were developed, all matching systemwide totals: Allsys- All records, at route level ODsys-All records with O/D information, at route level ODTPsys- All records with O/D and purpose information, at route level ODTP_Geosys- All records with O/D and purpose information, at segment level
Please refer to documentation for information about sample plan, survey instruments, field implementation, and data expansion.
descript.purpose: To assist the Twin Cities Metropolitan Planning Organization with transportation planning and project programming in the Twin Cities region.
descript.supplinf: Origins and Destinations of surveyed users in the 7 Country Metropolitan area and surrounding counties

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County, Sherburne County, Wright County, Isanti County, Chisago County, Polk County, Pierce County, St. Croix County, Goodhue County, Rice County, Le Sueur County, McLeod County, Sibley County, Minnesota, Wisconsin, Minneapolis, St. Paul

theme.themekey: Travel Behavior Inventory, TBI, transit, household interview survey, household ravel survey, home interview survey, HIS

procstep.procdesc: Data was entered by three modes: mailback, web, and phone interview. The mode is indicated in the household table.
